Quasar:



Quasar looked at the pair of bots with her in the room. The male bot 
with wide optics suddenly stopped looking at her and turned his 
attention back to the one on the table. 

It was a moment before he turned back to her. He wasn't saying 
anything to her. When she was about to say something, he spoke.

"Follow me." He picked up the dark armored bot on the table and 
walked out. She gingerly followed, following him to someone's 
quarters. "Wait out here," he said. 

He left her by the frame of the door, in the hallway. He carried the 
spider bot to a bunk and layed her down. She wondered what was going 
on. 

She turned her head away and looked at herself in the reflection of 
the metal wall. Her optics went wide. Her optics, and even body was 
much like the young male's. She studied her reflection, then his. She 
looked back and forth. The spiderbot even reminded herself of her.

She lowered her brows.
